title: Stocks and Crypto Tick Up As Amazon Announces $50,000,000,000 AI Investment For US Government Customers
body: Crypto assets and stocks are moving higher, buoyed by a massive new artificial intelligence (AI) investment from Amazon. On Monday morning, the tech giant announced it planned to sink $50 billion into AI and supercomputing capabilities for Amazon Web Services (AWS) US government customers.

title: 'Privacy Is Hygiene,’ Says Ethereum Creator Vitalik Buterin After Bank Data Leak
body: A major security breach impacting U. S. banks has renewed debate on privacy as interest in crypto privacy tools and protocols grows.

title: Largest Ethereum treasury BitMine invests another $200 million, addresses recent ETH price decline
body: The Tom Lee-backed company predicted a few weeks ago the likely downside for ETH prices would be around $2,500.

title: Ethereum Hits Make-or-Break Level in Elliott Wave Structure
body: Ethereum is approaching one of the most decisive moments of its current cycle as the market weighs two competing interpretations of its trend. Although the viewpoints differ, both analysts focus on the same defining threshold: the $2,200 support zone.

title: Bit Digital Increases ETH Holdings And Posts 33% Revenue Growth In Q3

title: BitMine's Earnings Tease A MAVAN Moonshot — And Cathie Wood, Ken Griffin Were Buying Months Ago

title: Spot bitcoin ETFs see near-record outflows of $903 million
body: Spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds in the U. S. posted their second-largest daily outflow since their inception.

title: Coinbase Rolls Out Million-Dollar ETH Loans As Base Lending Surges
body: Coinbase is pushing deeper into onchain finance with the launch of Ethereum-backed loans for eligible U. S. customers, a move that lets users borrow up to $1 million in USDC without selling a single unit of ETH

title: BlackRock Registers New Staked Ether Trust ETF In Delaware, Eyes SEC Approval
body: BlackRock is seeking to go beyond simple Ether (ETH) exposure and participate in Ethereum’s proof-of-stake consensus system.

title: BlackRock Registers Entity for New Staked Ethereum ETF, Filing Expected Soon
body: BlackRock has taken a major step toward launching a Staked Ethereum ETF, according to a new Delaware statutory trust registration uncovered on November 19, 2025. The filing lists the entity name “iShares Staked Ethereum Trust ETF,” strongly signaling that an official submission under the Securities Act of 1933 is imminent.

title: BlackRock Registers Staked Ethereum Trust
body: The world’s largest asset manager is making preparations for a staked ETH ETF.
